text:
I was first drawn to this gem tucked in the corner of Hao Mart Westgate because of the myriad of Sakes available & the camaraderie forged among the usual crowd there is what makes it even more enjoyable. On top of it all, the captain steering the ship, Jay is always so hospitable & willing to share his knowledge in sake & other booze.

Not to worry if you just want to have a drink alone, the crowd will not bother you unless you show interest in joining. Cheers!

Definition of hidden gem
The most food on a menu you can find in Singapore
Cocktail Bar class service and above
Cheaper than most bars you can think of
A must try, you'll be back for more
A very nice and cosy corner to chill and chat, not the rowdy type. Would highly recommend the place for catchup over a good drink.
A must go place for few drinks while waiting for wife do groceries. Good service and quality sake and wine. Thumbs up!!!üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº
Nice ambience, good place to chill
